name: zenoh-ts-chat
description: Simple example of using zenoh-ts library on the web page
author: Michael Ilyin <milyin@gmail.com>

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && webpack --config webpack.config.js && cp assets/* dist/
scripts._build: sh -c '[ ! -d "node_modules" ] || [ ! -d "dist" ] && yarn clean && yarn install && yarn build || true'
